data.title: How BitRaise Works?
data.description: BitRaise simplifies the process of crowdfunding by leveraging blockchain technology for secure, transparent transactions. Here's how you can get involved, whether you're aiming to support a cause or kickstart your project.

featuredItems.title: Connect Your Wallet
featuredItems.desc: Start by connecting your crypto wallet. We support major wallets for seamless transactions, ensuring your contributions are swift and secure.

featuredItems.title: Browse or Post Campaigns
featuredItems.desc: Explore active campaigns needing support or post your own campaign. BitRaise makes it easy to find causes you care about or share your visionary project with the world.

featuredItems.title: Contribute or Raise Funds
featuredItems.desc: Contribute to campaigns using cryptocurrency or raise funds for your project. Every transaction is recorded on the blockchain, offering unparalleled transparency and trust.

vision.title: BitRaise: Decentralized Blockchain Crowdfunding
vision.desc: BitRaise empowers creators by connecting them directly with backers on a secure, transparent blockchain platform. This decentralized approach ensures every transaction is immutable, promoting trust and community-driven innovation.
